text:
I wanted to test the results of various configurations for mod_autoindex - the autoindex3.t file contains a list of both the input .htaccess conf and the expected html output - and when run compares it using string comparison.

It re-uses the htaccess and file creation used in the original test for simplicity

I hope this makes it simple for others to add tests

Sven
creator: SvenDowideit@home.org.au
